plot: Nobita uses a future diary to change his fate but learns cheating has consequences.

title_en: The Prophecy of the Fortune-Telling Card
title_jp: うらないカードの予言
plot: Nobita uses fortune-telling cards to predict the future but misinterprets them.
moral_lesson: Don't rely too much on predictions.

title_jp: タイムマシンがなくなった！
plot: Doraemon's time machine goes missing, causing chaos.
Nobita uses a truth-telling camera that forces people to be honest.
moral_lesson: Truth can be uncomfortable but necessary.

plot: Nobita wraps objects to age or rejuvenate them with chaotic results.
moral_lesson: Respect the natural flow of time.

plot: Nobita misuses the door to travel anywhere, leading to trouble.
moral_lesson: With great power comes great responsibility.

plot: Nobita learns to fly but faces unexpected challenges.
Nobita shrinks to explore the world from a new perspective.
A mirror that lies causes Nobita to question his self-image.
Nobita spies on past and future events, invading privacy.
Nobita copies knowledge but learns shortcuts have limits.
Nobita controls others like puppets, leading to rebellion.
Nobita uses a hoop to walk through walls, causing chaos.
Nobita alters reality with 'what-if' scenarios, facing unintended results.
moral_lesson: Be careful what you wish for.

plot: Nobita uses an air gun to manipulate objects remotely.
Nobita creates 'ghosts' to scare others, but it backfires.
Nobita watches others' dreams, violating their privacy.
Nobita builds a house on clouds but learns about impermanence.
Nobita turns into animals but struggles to revert.
moral_lesson: Be content with who you are.

plot: Nobita repairs broken items by reversing their time.
Nobita controls his shadow, which develops a mind of its own.
Nobita shrinks or enlarges objects, disrupting his neighborhood.
Nobita becomes a magnet for people, losing personal space.
Nobita creates fake alibis but gets tangled in lies.

title_jp: 感情エネルギーメーター
plot: Nobita manipulates emotions, causing unintended conflicts.
Nobita buries a time capsule but future Nobita digs it up prematurely.
Nobita directs others' dreams but loses control.
Nobita controls the weather, disrupting natural balance.
Nobita swaps bodies with others, experiencing their lives.
Nobita relies on fortune-telling paper for decisions.
Nobita stamps people to make them angry, causing fights.
Nobita becomes invisible but feels isolated.
Nobita duplicates himself, leading to identity confusion.
Nobita uses unbreakable glue, trapping himself.
Nobita eats bread to memorize textbooks but forgets after digestion.
Nobita grows monster plants that terrorize the town.
Nobita pauses time but disrupts daily life.
Nobita's schoolbag does homework but makes him lazy.
Nobita plays Santa but learns giving is harder than it seems.

title_en: The New Year's Eve Time Machine
title_jp: 大みそかタイムマシン
plot: Nobita tries to relive New Year's Eve repeatedly.
Nobita's actions are reversed, causing confusion.
Nobita cheats to win the lottery but loses everything.
Nobita builds a snowman that comes to life.
Nobita uses a lie detector but hurts others' feelings.
Nobita's robot chef makes food too good, causing dependency.
Nobita manipulates time zones, disrupting schedules.
Nobita adopts a 'pet rock' that becomes a nuisance.
Nobita enters a miniature world but gets trapped.
Nobita wins a lottery but loses the ticket.
Nobita enters a storybook but can't escape the plot.
